prcp_max.description: Maximum values of all input monthly precipitation normal values

prcp_min.description: Minimum values of all input monthly precipitation normal values

prcp_std.description: Standard deviation of all input monthly precipitation normal values

tavg_max.description: Maximum values of all input monthly mean temperature normal values

tavg_min.description: Minimum values of all input monthly mean temperature normal values

tavg_std.description: Standard deviation of all input monthly mean temperature normal values

tmax_max.description: Maximum values of all input monthly maximum temperature normal values

tmax_min.description: Minimum values of all input monthly maximum temperature normal values

tmax_std.description: Standard deviation of all input monthly maximum temperature normal values

tmin_max.description: Maximum values of all input monthly minimum temperature normal values

tmin_min.description: Minimum values of all input monthly minimum temperature normal values

tmin_std.description: Standard deviation of all input monthly minimum temperature normal values

prcp_flag.description: Number of months used to calculate seasonal precipitation normals

prcp_norm.description: Seasonal precipitation normals (WSSF) from monthly normals

tavg_flag.description: Number of months used to calculate seasonal mean temperature normals

tavg_norm.description: Seasonal mean temperature normals (WSSF) from monthly normals

tmax_flag.description: Number of months used to calculate seasonal maximum temperature normals

tmax_norm.description: Seasonal maximum temperature normals (WSSF) from monthly normals

tmin_flag.description: Number of months used to calculate seasonal minimum temperature normals

tmin_norm.description: Seasonal minimum temperature normals (WSSF) from monthly normals
